title: Queue time
body:
Estimated Time: 3:29
Time: 16:27

and it's still going

Is this a bug or is it just that nobody plays draft pick at lv 13 smurf accounts

replies.body: I'm wondering if maybe your network had a hiccup, which may have tossed you out of queue despite the timer.  Are you on the updated client?  You may need to relog and queue again.  I hope that helps get you into game!
